Package Battle.GeneralBattle

Class Deck

java.lang.Object
Battle.GeneralBattle.Deck
public class Deck extends Object
This class implement the deck constituted of the action cards of an unit.

  • Constructor Details

    • Deck

      public Deck​(ArrayList<WeaponActionCard> actionCardsList, Weapon weapon)
      Creates a new instance of deck and sets the properties of the pane and buttons of the deck. It also initialises the handsCard by drawing two random cards.
      Parameters:
      actionCardsList - the list of the available action cards
      weapon - the weapon to which belongs the deck

  • Method Details

    • getCloseButton

      public javafx.scene.control.Button getCloseButton()
      Returns the button closing this deck's pane.

    • newTurn

      public void newTurn()
      Redraws the cards until the player has 2 cards in hands for this weapon.

    • discard

      public void discard​(int index)
      Discards the selected card.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the discarded card

    • getDeckPane

      public javafx.scene.layout.GridPane getDeckPane()
      Returns the pane of the deck.
